group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of Indiana University and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Informed consent was obtained from all respondents for being included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflict of interest.
